description: This is the main entry point for a React web application, responsible for rendering the root React component into the DOM.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a root for rendering a React component tree into a container DOM element.

methods.name: React.StrictMode
methods.description: A wrapper component to enable additional checks and warnings for its descendants in development mode.

methods.name: root.render
methods.description: Renders the React component tree into the specified DOM root.
